com.apusplay.sdk.pay

接口 Sku


  • public interface Sku
    Represents an in-app product SKU(Stock Keeping Unit).

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String ITEM_TYPE_INAPP 
      static String ITEM_TYPE_SUBS 
      static String SUBS_BIWEEKLY 
      static String SUBS_MONTHLY 
      static String SUBS_PERIOD 
      static String SUBS_QUARTERLY 
      static String SUBS_WEEKLY 
      static String SUBS_YEARLY 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getDescription()
      Detail description for the sku
      String getName()
      The SKU (Stock keeping unit 库存量单位) name string
      String getPrice()
      price value for each unit in string
      long getPriceAmountMicros() 
      String getPriceCurrencyCode()
      In which currency the price used
      float getPriceValue()
      The price in number value
      String getProductId()
      The SKU (Stock keeping unit 库存量单位) id string
      String getTitle()
      The SKU name, or product name
      String getType()
      SKU type: "inapp", the normal item type to purchase or "subs", the subscription type, which would occur periodically, weekly, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
      boolean isConsumable()
      If the item purchased is consumable.
